abstract: Human rights groups release report accusing Western-backed Ukrainian security forces of using same methods of torture and abuse practiced by Russian-backed rebels they are fighting.

headline.print_headline: Ukraine’s Security Services and Rebels Are Said to Be Equals in Torture
headline.main: Ukraine’s Security Services and Rebels Are Said to Be Equals in Torture

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A report by Human Rights Watch and Amnesty International cites abuses by both sides in the war, including waterboarding and the use of electric shocks....
lead_paragraph: A report by Human Rights Watch and Amnesty International cites abuses by both sides in the war, including waterboarding and the use of electric shocks.
